name: astrochickens
description: A space exploration game of massive scale.

scripts.test: jshint bin lib test index.js && mocha -R spec
scripts.bundle-assets: mkdir -p build/assets; find assets/ -name *.png | xargs -i cp {} build/assets/
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-assets && npm run bundle-html
scripts.start: npm run bundle && npm run compile && serve build
